testcase.name: customer_purchase_product
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to the home page.............................................passed And user enters existing email as "raya@gmail.com" and password "raya@gmail.com12".passed When customer goes to women section select tees and click...................passed Then select Gwyn Tee and click medium size and green color..................passed And hover over and click Add to cart........................................passed And click the number next to cart symbol....................................passed And click on qty box and change the number and click update.................passed And customer click proceed button and verifies address......................passed When customer return previous page and click on view edit...................passed Then verify discount applied................................................passed And change the quantity and click Update....................................passed And customer return women department page...................................passed And choose the item and add to the basket...................................passed And goes to the fitness page and select the item............................passed And checks the cart and verifies total amount...............................passed
